thread.title: BRIEF-PogoTec To Go Public Under Regulation A+ Stock Offering With Shares Available To Retail Investors Effective Immediately

title: BRIEF-PogoTec To Go Public Under Regulation A+ Stock Offering With Shares Available To Retail Investors Effective Immediately

organizations.name: retail investors effective immediately reuters staff

text: 08 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-PogoTec To Go Public Under Regulation A+ Stock Offering With Shares Available To Retail Investors Effective Immediately Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 20 (Reuters) - Pogotec Inc: * POGOTEC TO GO PUBLIC UNDER REGULATION A+ STOCK OFFERING WITH SHARES AVAILABLE TO RETAIL INVESTORS EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY * POGOTEC INC - ‍REGULATION A+ INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING OF UP TO $32 MILLION HAS BEEN QUALIFIED BY SEC​ * POGOTEC INC - ‍RETAIL INVESTORS CAN PURCHASE EQUITY IN POGOTEC AT $11 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
